nodes.text: Star Wars: Prequel Trilogy is an eBook from Disney–Lucasfilm Press that was released on May 4, 2014. It collects and republishes author Patricia C. Wrede's three junior novelizations of the Star Wars prequel trilogy: The Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones, and Revenge of the Sith.
Beginning with Episode I The Phantom Menace, Episode II The Clone Wars, [sic] and Episode III Revenge of the Sith, enjoy the greatest space saga ever told.
All three books in the prequel trilogy are included in this eBook collection.
Follow along as young Anakin Skywalker descends into the dark side!

Although this collection was published exclusively in eBook format, the listing for Star Wars: Prequel Trilogy on Disney's official website erroneously states that the product is available in print format.
